com.risk.behavior

Interface PlayerBehavior

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggressiveBehaviorImpl, BenevolantBehaviorImpl, CheaterBehaviorImpl, HumanBehaviorImpl, RandomBehaviorImpl

    public interface PlayerBehavior
    The Interface PlayerBehavior is the strategy interface which declares the methods for reinforce, attack and fortify. It is implemented by the following classes.
    • AggressiveBehaviorImpl
    • BenevolantBehaviorImpl
    • RandomBehaviorImpl
    • HumanBehaviorImpl
    • CheaterBehaviorImpl
